description: "Initiative on the Forest Economy" is an effort to create partnerships between local communities as custodians of forests, industries as the users and government as facilitators of wealth creation.
tasks: Led a cross-functional team of 4 to design, develop, and deploy the mobile-first Fi Application Suite}.
Spearheaded the creation of a one-stop solution for resolving forest rights concerns and recorded up-to-date information about the forest lands of over 500 communities across 3 states in East India.
Developed 4 applications (SpecieFi, MapiFi, RatiFi and FormiFi) impacting the lives of up to 5K forest landowners and officials.
Managed the production pipelines and created protocols for automated E2E testing.
